Package net.sf.saxon.exslt

This package provides implementations of the functions defined in EXSLT.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Common This class implements extension functions in the http://exslt.org/common namespace.
Date This class implements extension functions in the http://exslt.org/dates-and-times namespace.
Math This class implements extension functions in the http://exslt.org/math namespace.
Sets This class implements extension functions in the http://exslt.org/sets namespace.
 

Package net.sf.saxon.exslt Description

This package provides implementations of the functions defined in EXSLT.

The implementation of EXSLT functions is by no means complete (the specifications are continually evolving), but the major functions are provided - even where they are effectively superseded by functions available in XPath 2.0.

Michael H. Kay
25 April 2002
